name: The Regressed Genius Players Legendary Weapon Creation
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManhwa
content: The story of The Regressed Genius Player’s Mythical Weapon Creation introduces Kim Si-moon, a Level 1 alchemist cursed with magic incapability. On the day Earth was on the brink of destruction, Si-moon successfully created the Philosopher’s Stone—a miraculous object that can achieve anything through equivalent exchange. “Anything is possible, you say?
